titleStmt.title: Six dialogues about sea-services between an high-admiral and a captain at sea ... / by Nathaniel Boteler, Esq. ...
titleStmt.author: Boteler, Nathaniel.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Item incorrectly listed in reel guide at 131:12.

(from t.p.) The commanders in chief, in dialogue the first -- The common mariner, in dialogue the second -- The victualling out of ships, in dialogue the third -- The names of all the parts of a ship, in dialogue the fourth -- The choice of the best ships of war, in dialogue the fifth -- The sailing, signals, chases and fights, in dialogue the sixth.
